dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: One hundred and thirty-one migrants deported to Uzbekistan this week, that's a significant number.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: One hundred and thirty-one migrants deported to Uzbekistan this week, that's a significant number.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The United States has deported 131 illegal migrants to Uzbekistan, including citizens of Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, and Kyrgyzstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's not just Uzbek citizens, right? The report mentioned Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan as well.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's not just Uzbek citizens, right? The report mentioned Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan as well.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The United States has deported 131 illegal migrants to Uzbekistan, including citizens of Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, and Kyrgyzstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. The Department of Homeland Security made the announcement on April 30th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. The Department of Homeland Security made the announcement on April thirtieth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to a report by DW's Telegram channel, the U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS) announced the deportation on Wednesday, April 30.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And what's really interesting here is the funding. Tashkent covered all the costs for their citizens' deportation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And what's really interesting here is the funding. Tashkent covered all the costs for their citizens' deportation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to DHS, Tashkent covered all costs related to the deportation of Uzbek citizens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, they paid for the entire charter flight, according to Fox News. That's a pretty unusual arrangement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, they paid for the entire charter flight, according to Fox News. That's a pretty unusual arrangement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fox News reported that the Uzbek government fully paid for the charter flight used to return the migrants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's being called the first such deal under Trump's new administration. A real shift in how these things are handled.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's being called the first such deal under Trump's new administration. A real shift in how these things are handled.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The agreement between Washington and Tashkent to deport migrants at Uzbekistan's expense is the first such deal under the new administration of Donald Trump, the channel said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So the migrants from Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan, they'll just continue on from Uzbekistan to their home countries?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the migrants from Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan, they'll just continue on from Uzbekistan to their home countries?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Migrants holding Kazakh and Kyrgyz passports will reportedly continue their journey to their home countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's the plan, apparently. The flight left the U.S. on Wednesday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the plan, apparently. The flight left the U.S. on Wednesday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: American media stated that the deportation flight left the U.S. on Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: This is part of a much broader tightening, isn't it? Like, they've canceled a bunch of programs for legal entry and asylum.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: This is part of a much broader tightening, isn't it? Like, they've canceled a bunch of programs for legal entry and asylum.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following Donald Trump's return to the White House, U.S. immigration policy has tightened significantly. In the first weeks of his new term, programs that previously allowed foreigners to enter the country legally or seek asylum were canceled, affecting thousands of people, including Kazakh citizens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's affecting thousands of people. The Kazakh embassy even put out a statement, urging its citizens under deportation orders to return voluntarily.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's affecting thousands of people. The Kazakh embassy even put out a statement, urging its citizens under deportation orders to return voluntarily.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the Embassy of Kazakhstan in Washington urged citizens who are in the U.S. under a deportation order to take advantage of the opportunity to voluntarily return to their homeland in order to avoid fines and other sanctions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: To avoid fines and sanctions, yeah. It's a stark message.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To avoid fines and sanctions, yeah. It's a stark message.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the Embassy of Kazakhstan in Washington urged citizens who are in the U.S. under a deportation order to take advantage of the opportunity to voluntarily return to their homeland in order to avoid fines and other sanctions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It really underscores how much U.S. immigration policy has changed since the election.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really underscores how much U.S. immigration policy has changed since the election.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A concrete example of a campaign promise becoming, uh, very real policy very quickly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A concrete example of a campaign promise becoming, uh, very real policy very quickly.
